mapper.select: select count(*) from review where recipient=#{value}

select p.name,p.id,p.address1,rv.contents,to_char(rv.regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')as regdate, pf.sysname from person p left join review rv on rv.reviewer = p.id left join PROFILEFILES pf on pf.parentseq = p.id where rv.recipient =#{value}
select sysName from profilefiles join review on (review.reviewer = profilefiles.parentseq) where review.recipient=#{value}
select reviewer from review where recipient=#{value}
select * from review where reviewer=#{id} and boardtype=#{talent}
select count(*) from review where parentseq=#{value}
